artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Aritaya Seiemon
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: vertical ōban triptych as follows: 5 men with swords near a bridge; two men with swords; three men with a rope ladder
inscription: The name of each warrior is written beside its figure
markings: Censor: Murata; publisher\'s seal: {Aritaya Seiemon ban}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Vengenance of the Forty-seven Rōnin
